apps.name: AppDB Client
apps.subtitle: A fully-featured iOS client for appdb.to

versions.localizedDescription:
• Support for Free Enterprise Signing
• Support for appdb PLUS
• Full support for latest appdb features
• Support for injecting dylibs, frameworks and debs into apps - Make sure to enable "Ask for installation options" in Settings!
• Support for AltStore repos
• Support for displaying link reports and link compatibility
• Various UI and bug fixes

apps.versionDescription:
• Support for Free Enterprise Signing
• Support for appdb PLUS
• Full support for latest appdb features
• Support for injecting dylibs, frameworks and debs into apps - Make sure to enable "Ask for installation options" in Settings!
• Support for AltStore repos
• Support for displaying link reports and link compatibility
• Various UI and bug fixes
apps.localizedDescription:
AppDB Client is a fully featured app aiming to provide a better experience for every appdb user

Features:

• Easily browse appdb database with a blazing fast and smooth user interface
• Control all your appdb linked devices
• Install any content to your device after authorizing the app
• Dowload IPAs from the web and install them right away
• MyAppStore & Automatic Requests integration!
• A wonderful dark mode
• iOS 14 homescreen Widgets!

And a lot more…

apps.name: ESign
apps.subtitle: IPA Self Signer, Tweak Injector, File Manager

versions.localizedDescription:
• ESign updated to v4.8.1
• The list of installed applications supports filtering

• ESign updated to v4.7.8
• Support Remove mobileprovision after signing
• Support clear app data (iOS15-15.7.1 and 16.0-16.1.2)
• Fixed bugs

• ESign updated to v4.7.6
• Support backup and restore application data (iOS15-15.7.1 and 16.0-16.1.2)
• Fix bugs

apps.versionDescription:
• ESign updated to v4.8.1
• The list of installed applications supports filtering
apps.localizedDescription: Easy Sign (esign) is a tool that can sign IPA files without a jailbreak and is capable of injecting libraries, removing libraries, and so on.

apps.name: iTorrent
apps.subtitle: An ordinary torrent client for iOS with Files app support
apps.localizedDescription:
iTorrent - a torrent client for iOS with Files app support.

What this app can do:

• Download in the background
• Sequential download (use VLC to watch films while loading)
• Add torrent files from Share menu (Safari and other apps)
• Add magnet links directly from Safari
• Store files in Files app (iOS 11+)
• File sharing directly from app
• Download torrent by link
• Download torrent by magnet
• Send notification on torrent downloaded
• WebDAV Server
• Select files to download or not
• Change UI to dark theme
• RSS Feed

apps.name: WDBRemoveThreeAppLimit
apps.subtitle: Removes three app limit from AltStore!
apps.localizedDescription:
An app that removes the three app limit for free provisioning. Hit "Go" just before installing apps. Should work on iOS 16.1.2 and below / iOS 15.7.1 and below.

This is very limited:

• Apps still expire after a week
• They still do not get arbitrary entitlements
• They still must be signed. It's probably not going to be that useful. It's meant more as a demo of what you can do with MacDirtyCow.

apps.name: Cowabunga
apps.subtitle: The MacDirtyCow Toolbox for iOS 14 – iOS 16

versions.localizedDescription:
• You can now choose to enable v8 and/or v10 theming
• Padding for file path replacing operations
• Added back keyboard buttons audio
• More safety with icon theming: first attempts to revert corrupted files before aborting
• Improved error messages
• Fixed springboard tools view sizing on ipads
• Fixed springboard tools on RTL languages
• Updated backend repo for explore page

apps.versionDescription:
• You can now choose to enable v8 and/or v10 theming
• Padding for file path replacing operations
• Added back keyboard buttons audio
• More safety with icon theming: first attempts to revert corrupted files before aborting
• Improved error messages
• Fixed springboard tools view sizing on ipads
• Fixed springboard tools on RTL languages
• Updated backend repo for explore page
apps.localizedDescription:
A Jailed toolbox application for iOS 14.0-15.7.1 and 16.0-16.1.2 using CVE-2022-46689

Enable Notifications and set Location Services to Always to keep the app running in the background, keep the dock and folder background hidden, and prevent some sound effects from reverting.

Warning: Some changes are permanent on iOS 14.0-14.8.1

Features
- Running in the background to keep some changes from reverting
    - From running tests, battery loss is negligible (~1% per day on frequent), but that may very

- Springboard
    - Hide dock
    - Hide home bar
    - Hide folder backgrounds
    - Disable folder background blur
    - Disable app switcher blur

- Audio
    - Custom sound effects
    - Upload your own sounds (nearly every audio format allowed!)

- Passcode
    - Customize passcode keys
    - Import passcode keys files (.passthm) from TrollTools

- Misc
    - Custom carrier name
    Warning: Use the features below at your own risk!
    - Change system version (shows in settings, iOS 15+)
    - Enable iPhone X Gestures
    - Enable Dynamic Island (iOS 16+)

- Extra Tools
    - Lock Screen Footnote
    - Supervise Device
    - Device Organization Name
    - No Lock On Respring
    - Numeric Wi-Fi/Cellular Strength
